lines.text: She's my idea of an honest-to-John woman.

[to Cimarron Rose]
You're not only new, but your fresh.

[Slaps Marshal Jackson's face after he grabs and kisses her, she then smiles at him]
Goodnight, marshal. Thanks for seeing me home.
Well, now you know. I'm Belle Starr's daughter and I'm proud of it.

[after his deputy is shot]
You hit bad?

[to Cimarron Rose]
You are about the prettiest girl I know... and the most bull-headed.
